column4: Where do Windows shares get mounted?  I have two that show up in Places but aren't accessible to some apps.
the ones you mount with Places are sort of virtual mounts, only apps that use the gnome virtual file system can see those, like gedit, the pdf viewer, and some others
yeah I figured that.  oh well.. I'll just have to use different tools for some things.
I don't use smb much at all, but many people like fusesmb
